titleStmt.title: The fatall doom, or, The charms of divine love by R.H.
titleStmt.author: R. H.
Hooke, Robert, 1635-1703.

notesStmt.note: Dedication to George Berkley signed: Your Honours most humble chaplain R.H.
Attribution to Robert Hooke in BM and Wing is doubtful, as he was only twenty at the time, and not a clergyman.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
